```{r}
Gamma <- cbind(
  c(0.0,0.2,0.6,1.4,1.8),
  c(0.2,0.0,0.4,1.2,1.6),
  c(0.6,0.4,0.0,1.0,1.4),
  c(1.4,1.2,1.0,0.0,0.8),
  c(1.8,1.6,1.4,0.8,0.0)
)
print(checkGamma(Gamma, returnBoolean = TRUE))
```

```{r}
library(graphicalExtremes)
library(RcppCNPy)

n <- 10000
d <- 5

X <- rmstable(n, model = "HR", d = d, par = Gamma)  # unit-Fréchet max-stable
HR_5_dim <- exp(-1 / X)

npySave("HR_5_dim.npy", HR_5_dim)
```

```{r}
# for big sample

big <- 250000


X_big <- rmstable(big, model = "HR", d = d, par = Gamma)  # unit-Fréchet max-stable
HR_5_dim_big <- exp(-1 / X_big)

npySave("HR_5_dim_big.npy", HR_5_dim_big)
```
